text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Oh, @VP, ya' better check in back in #Indiana. #COVID19 is busting out all over and the @GOP pols are so frustrated about wearing masks they don't know what to do. Emperor says "OPEN WIDE", biz matters, people don't.
